bill_title: authorize the secretary of commerce and regulation to issue restricted driver licenses to persons whose driving privileges have been withdrawn and to promulgate certain administrative rules.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to authorize the secretary of commerce and regulation to issue restricted driver licenses to persons whose driving privileges have been withdrawn and to promulgate certain administrative rules. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 32-12 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: The secretary of commerce and regulation may issue a restricted license to a person whose license has been suspended, revoked, disqualified, or canceled pursuant to § 32-12-49 to allow the person to drive to and from the person's place of employment or for purposes of the person's employment. The secretary of commerce and regulation may promulgate rules pursuant to chapter 1-26 for restricted licenses with regard to eligibility, application, determination, limitations, duration, and grounds for revocation. 750 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.016 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to authorize the secretary of commerce and regulation to issue restricted driver licenses to persons whose driving privileges have been withdrawn and to promulgate certain administrative rules. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 32-12 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: The secretary of commerce and regulation may issue a restricted license to a person whose license has been suspended, revoked, disqualified, or canceled pursuant to § 32-12-49 to allow the person to drive to and from the person's place of employment, for purposes of the person's employment, or for attendance at school. The secretary of commerce and regulation may promulgate rules pursuant to chapter 1-26 for restricted licenses with regard to eligibility, application, determination, limitations, duration, and grounds for revocation. BILL HISTORY 1/12/99 First read in House and referred to Commerce. H.J. 39 1/26/99 Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date. 1/26/99 Commerce Do Pass Amended, Passed, AYES 12, NAYS 0. H.J. 187 1/26/99 Commerce Place on Consent Calendar.
